about_the_game:
Your wife. His wife. Whose wife? Everybody's wife! Want to raise a wife of your own? Just play with it! Wanna dance? The pas de deux kind. Just play it!

Anyone who doesn't have a wife should report~

This is a costume game, a large number of clothes can be changed, different models can choose. With beautiful music and dynamic dance, enjoy the joy it brings you!

Men's clothing

■ Body shape - can change the level of obesity in boys

■ Hair - Can change boys hair style

■ Beard - can change the shape of boys' beard

■ Head - Can change the shape of a boy's head

■ Skin - Can change the color of boys' skin

■ Hats - Can change the type of boys' hats

■ Jacket - can change the men's top clothing

■ Pants - can change the boys pants clothing

■ Shoes - can change the boys shoes outfit

■ Glasses - can change the type of glasses for boys

■ Watch - can change the style of men's watch

■ Headphones - can change the style of boys' headphones

Girl style

■ Different hairstyles

■ Different hair colors

■ Different tops

■ Different pants

■ Different shoes

■ Partially in underwear

Gameplay mechanism

■ A gentle stream runs long

This game requires your patience, and over time, it will bring you a small stream of gold. You can also tap on the screen to fire bullets, which will also give you quick gold.

■ Lucky moment

While enjoying the music and dance, in addition to slowly accumulating gold coins, the game will also appear randomly scattered money magic. When you fire a bullet that hits it, you instantly gain a large amount of gold. Aim for angles, accumulate wealth. Of course, even if this is not your strong point, every minute of highlight moment can make you quickly gain wealth. At this moment you need a quick click of the mouse, and a steady stream of gold coins will arrive.

What are you waiting for? Such a good wife, who can not love ~

content_descriptors.notes: The girl model that can be unlocked contains some models wearing underwear

name: Your wife oh

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX2050
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 默认
  • VR Support: 不支持
  • Additional Notes: 尽量自己游玩哦
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i5-12500H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX4060
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 默认
  • VR Support: 不支持
  • Additional Notes: 尽量自己游玩哦
